UniprotID	Q8NBZ7
Accession	Q8NBZ7;Q8NBX3;Q9H5C2
EntryName	UXS1_HUMAN
ProteinName	UDP-glucuronic acid decarboxylase 1 (EC 4.1.1.35) (UDP-glucuronate decarboxylase 1) (UGD) (UXS-1) (hUXS) (hUXS1)
GeneName	UXS1 UNQ2538/PRO6079
Length	420
Function	Catalyzes the NAD-dependent decarboxylation of UDP-glucuronic acid to UDP-xylose (PubMed:22810237, PubMed:23656592, PubMed:25521717). Necessary for the biosynthesis of the core tetrasaccharide in glycosaminoglycan biosynthesis (PubMed:22810237, PubMed:23656592, PubMed:25521717).
Subcellular Location	Golgi apparatus; Golgi stack membrane
